intro: Psychotria nitens, commonly known as the pink psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil and Peru. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, fragrant, pinkish-white flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in the undergrowth of tropical rainforests. Psychotria nitens is also noted for its ornamental value and is sometimes cultivated in botanical gardens.
